summary: HDT Shadow Cat armor CBBE - Retextured - SILVERCAT ARMOR
descriptionHtml:
Shadow Cat Armor was not shiny enough.

I added stats to the unarmed combat, because of the claws.  Increased the stealthiness also.  Crafting is 1 single piece for the armor suit.  There is no helmet so I would suggest something with kitty ears ^^

Added 2 basic models.  Found under Leather.  "Silvercat Suit H" and "Silvercat Suit L". 
As well, 2 Advanced Models.  Found under Steel.  Advanced Armor perk is required.  "Silvercat Suit H Advanced" and "Silvercat Suit L Advanced"
The Advanced is twice as resistant/potent as the basic.  The basic has stats.  +15 for all; Sneak, Muffle, Unarmed Damage, Unarmed Damage vs. undead, ghosts, vampires and werewolves(It is silvered).  Advanced is +30 for the same stats.

Here is a video showing my test run of the unarmed strength.  This is using the Advanced model.

[youtube]quhQgBwIaiY[/youtube]

Required:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extension [/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE-[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS[/url]

Thanks to Winrie for bringing us this mod.  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67988/?]Original[/url]
author: Lovely999
